net.frozencode.jniolib.server

Class JNioTCPChannel

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.frozencode.jniolib.server.JNioChannel
      • net.frozencode.jniolib.server.JNioTCPChannel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.nio.channels.ByteChannel, java.nio.channels.Channel, java.nio.channels.ReadableByteChannel, java.nio.channels.WritableByteChannel
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    JNioSSLChannel

    public class JNioTCPChannel
extends JNioChannel
    The JNioTCPChannel class stores data about and provides methods to communicate with a client over TCP. This class is thread-safe.

      • remaining

        public int remaining()
        Returns the number of bytes held in this client's read buffer. Note that, if multiple threads make calls to read(), the value returned by this method is not guaranteed to reflect the number of bytes which will be delivered when a call to read() is made. If only one thread calls read(), this method is guaranteed to return the minimum number of bytes which would be delivered by read(), but more may be delivered. Note that, if data is being read from the client when this method is called, this method will briefly block until data is no longer being read from the client.
        Returns:
        the number of bytes held in this client's read buffer.

      • read

        public int read(java.nio.ByteBuffer dst)
